nodes.text: Nightcast was a Stalwart-class freighter originally owned by Karu Nelbin.

Nelbin was killed by professional assassin Callandri, who decided to keep Nelbin's ship for herself. She modified the ship, replacing many of the components with Imperial military designs. She usually kept her ground vehicle, a Jadai Q-6100, in the ship's hold.
Callandri used the Nightcast as one of the three ships of the Granse Confederacy, alongside the Mist Laden and the Waterspire.
